text: Tapa'im sodhnush ‘‘ki akasaharu ra prthviko palanakarta ko ho?’’. Bhanidinus! ‘‘Allaha’’. Sodhnush! ‘‘Ke timi pheri pani usabaheka arula'i sahayogi bana'iraheka chau? Jo svayam aphno jiva jyanako ramro naramrobare kunai akhtiyari rakhdainan’’. Sodhah ‘‘ke andho ra amkhavala barabara huna sakchan? Ke andhakara ra prakasa samana huna sakchan? Ke jasala'i uni allahako sajhedara thaharya'iraheka chana, unale pani allaha jastai praniharu nirmana gareka chan, jasale unako drstima nirmanako pharka sankako ghera bhitra a'isakeko cha’’, bhanidinush ‘‘matra allaha nai sabai praniharuko janmadata ho tyo eka matra eklo cha ra visala saktisali cha.’’
